entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (mtp_destroy_all_droids_giver.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_11: I need your help. The lower maintenance areas are full of droids. Can you go destroy some of them? I'd do it myself, but...um...oh, I have a bad knee. Yeah, that's it.
entries.s_15: Oh good. You'll have to be fast though. After a while, security droids will notice all the noise and investigate. You'll only have about ten minutes once you're down there.
entries.s_19: Oh, couldn't get them all in time? I'm not surprised. None of us could do it either.
entries.s_20: You knee starting to go bad as well?
entries.s_4: You got rid of all those droids? What a relief! Thank you!!
entries.s_7: Go get rid of those droids. The lower levels are full of them. They give me the creeps...being so close to us.
entries.s_9: It's not yet safe to go back and get rid of more droids. It might attract too much attention.
